casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Travis Levance WALTERS. No. 58A02. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 16, 2004. Carlton M. Mansfield, Lumberton, for Walters. William N. Farrell, Jr., Senior Deputy Attorney General, L. Johnson Britt, III, District Attorney, for State.

Motion by Defendant to Extend Time for Court Reporter to Prepare and Deliver Transcript has been filed and the following order entered:

"Motion Allowed. Court Reporter shall have up to and including the 14th day of May 2004 to Prepare and Deliver Transcript. By order of the Court in conference this the 16th day of January 2004."
